1.0.name: wordpress/boilerplate
1.0.description: A merger created by Aaron T. Grogg (http://aarontgrogg.com/) of the HTML5 Boilerplate (http://html5boilerplate.com/) and the Starkers theme (http://starkerstheme.com/), Boilerplate: Starkers provides developers with an ideal, bleeding-edge, clean-start theme. Mark-up is minimal (thanks Elliott) and the most edge-case web technology is baked right in (thanks Paul, Divya and a large cast of supporting characters)!  Boilerplate themes are designed to serve as a Parent theme to whatever Child (http://codex.wordpress.org/Child_Themes) you care to add, but you could just as easily use this as a starting point and alter the PHP as your design needs. More about this theme can be found at http://aarontgrogg.com/boilerplate/.
